articles.title: Russia 'gains ground in 80%' Bakhmut; Wagner parades U.S. armoured vehicle - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia’s Wagner forces are gaining ground in Bakhmut. Yevgeny Prigozhin, chief of the mercenary group, claimed that his forces control 80% of Bakhmut.

articles.title: Novak Djokovic Makes Winning Return In Monte-Carlo - ATP Tour
articles.description: Novak Djokovic made a winning return to action on Tuesday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where he defeated qualifier Ivan Gakhov in straight sets. The World No. 1 will next play Lorenzo Musetti or Luca Nardi.
